definition: metal and stone/fig. hard objects/inscription on metal or bronze
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
touchstone/fig. test that sth is genuine
lapis lazuli (mineral of the square albite family)
lit. sincerity splits open metal and metal (idiom); if you put your heart to it, you can break up metal and rocks/With a will, you can achieve anything.
pinyin: jing1 cheng2 suo3 jia1 , jin1 shi2 wei4 kai1

definition: lit. sincerity splits open metal and metal (idiom); if you put your heart to it, you can break up metal and rocks/With a will, you can achieve anything.
pinyin: jing1 cheng2 suo3 zhi4 , jin1 shi2 wei4 kai1

sentences.english: Recognition of the Paraclete in the New Prophecy was their touchstone of authenticity.
sentences.chinese: 聖靈認識在新預言是其真實性的試金石。

sentences.english: We discovered a metal ring and a piece of lapis lazuli.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現了一個金屬環和一塊青金石。

sentences.english: He was also a famous book collector and epigrapher in Shantong area during Qian Long period.
sentences.chinese: 他也是乾隆朝山東著名的藏書家及金石學家。

sentences.english: That is the touchstone of our efforts in all these areas.
sentences.chinese: 對於我們在所有這些方面的努力，這是一個試金石。

sentences.english: Aventurine holds the tone of compassion along with all tones that are blue-green within the Language of Light.
sentences.chinese: 砂金石掌握同情音調和光之語內所有藍綠音調。

sentences.english: "Good faith due to open stone", which is a great talk about the role of honest.
sentences.chinese: “精誠所致，金石爲開”，這是講誠實的巨大的作用。

sentences.english: They are circling the Lapis Lazuli stone in clockwise direction.
sentences.chinese: 他們是以順時鐘的方向環繞著青金石。

sentences.english: Problems are the serious test that tells us success from failure.
sentences.chinese: 問題是幫我們辨別成功和失敗的重要的試金石。

sentences.english: From various Chinese musical instruments, people can find out the root of ancient Chinese national culture.
sentences.chinese: 從金石絲竹中，可探尋到中國古老民族的文化之根。

sentences.english: Preserved now on the Korean Peninsula are 233 inscriptions on ancient bronzes and stone tablets that are related to the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 現存朝鮮半島和唐朝關聯的金石碑誌共有233篇。

sentences.english: Patience and diligence, like faith, remove mountains.
sentences.chinese: 如同信念一樣，忍耐和勤奮同樣可以金石爲開。

sentences.english: In the past, Green Aventurine has been miscalled "Indian Jade".
sentences.chinese: 過去，綠沙金石被人們錯誤地叫着“印度玉”。

sentences.english: This part explores the influence of Epigraphy of Qing Dynasty on the practice of calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，宏觀探討清代金石學對書法實踐的影響。

sentences.english: If you are sincere enough, maybe he will change his mind.
sentences.chinese: 你要是誠心，說不定也會金石爲開，讓他改變心意呢。

sentences.english: Purple stone belongs to the class colored stone appreciate stone.
sentences.chinese: 紫金石屬於彩石類欣賞石。

definition: seal (of office)/seal script (a calligraphic style)/the small seal 小篆 and great seal 大篆/writing in seal script
ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs/pot (dialect)/to enter upon a period of (classical)/Kangxi radical 206/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes
jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
early form of Chinese characters inscribed in stone, a precursor of the small seal 小篆[xiao3 zhuan4]
